approvals.title: Cover v3 - Three-Section Layout
approvals.description: Per Yaakov's request: White top (pretitle 'Own your debt, fear no more'), Black middle (main title 'The Debt Code'), Light gray bottom (subtitle). Minimalist, Atomic Habits style.

brandAlternatives.title: Pure Minimal (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Clean flat cream, gold accent line, navy block. Zero texture, pure Swiss design minimalism. Typography-led.

brandAlternatives.title: Subtle Geometric (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Faint intersecting lines in cream section (watermark effect). Gold accent, navy block. Premium stationery feel.

brandAlternatives.title: Soft Organic (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Natural paper grain texture, warm organic feel. Gold accent, navy block. Artisan premium quality.

waitingItems.description: Repo is clean, all commits present. 522 = Cloudflare Pages build timeout. Redeploy triggered. Should recover in 5-10 min. Monitoring.

waitingItems.title: Complete Cloudflare Dashboard Deployment
waitingItems.description: Migration in progress. Token auth setup near completion. Ready to go live tomorrow morning (~20 mins final push).

waitingItems.title: Post-Launch SEO/Growth Strategy
waitingItems.description: Now that TDEE calculator is live: analyze competitor traffic tactics, backlink strategy, content expansion opportunities, and AEO positioning for search visibility.

completedItems.title: TDEE Calculator Deployed to Production
completedItems.description: 5 iterations complete. Live at https://main.tdee-calculator-8yb.pages.dev. Dark mode, CSV export, 23/23 tests, <1s load, 100% mobile responsive.

completedItems.title: Build Multi-Project Dashboard Layout
completedItems.description: Implemented project selector + project-scoped views. Master pulse tab aggregates all projects.

completedItems.title: ProjectCalc $100k Build Sprint Setup
completedItems.description: Initiated 3-day build sprint (Feb 6-8). Tech stack, design strategy, and build+research sub-agents launched.
